com.github.sahasatvik.cli

Class UnknownOptionValueTypeException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.github.sahasatvik.cli.ArgHandlerException
          • com.github.sahasatvik.cli.OptionException
            • com.github.sahasatvik.cli.UnknownOptionValueTypeException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class UnknownOptionValueTypeException
extends OptionException
    A UnknownOptionValueTypeException describes the nature of an error on parsing values of options in ArgHandler. This Exception is thrown when a Option value type class is not recognized.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0, 04/09/2016
    Author:
    Satvik Saha
    See Also:
    OptionException, ArgHandlerException, Serialized Form
